words.def: a dramatic work intended for performance by actors on a stage
any of various hard resins from trees of the family Dipterocarpaceae and of the genus Agathis
a unit of apothecary weight equal to an eighth of an ounce or to 60 grains
A member of a predominantly agricultural tribe of southern Assam and western Burma.
a flat-bottomed volcanic crater that was formed by an explosion
a barrier constructed to contain the flow of water or to keep out the sea
the most common computer memory which can be used by programs to perform necessary tasks while the computer is on
the month following February and preceding April
a unit of absorbed ionizing radiation equal to 100 ergs per gram of irradiated material
a public promotion of some product or service
a colorless and odorless inert gas
a dry form of lava resembling clinkers
